about_the_game:
Mirrorandum is an atmospheric visual novel where every decision reflects your inner self and shapes the story in unexpected ways. Set in a mysterious, ever-changing world, you take on the role of a wanderer searching for lost truths and uncovering secrets hidden within the reflections of others.

Explore a beautifully crafted narrative experience filled with stunning art, evocative music, and branching storylines that invite multiple playthroughs. As you delve deeper, you'll face choices that challenge your morals and reshape your perception of the characters and the world around you.

  • Immersive Narrative: Experience a deeply emotional story with rich characters and captivating dialogue.

  • Branching Choices: Shape the journey with impactful decisions that lead to multiple endings.

  • Replay Value: Explore alternate paths and uncover hidden layers of the story in subsequent playthroughs.

Will you uncover the truth hidden within the mirrors, or will the reflections distort your journey?
